news.title: Mid-Term Examination Schedule Released
news.body:
The mid-term examination schedule for Batch 25F has been released. Please check your respective subject pages for detailed timings.

**Important Points:**
- Exams start from October 20, 2025
- Bring your student ID card
- No electronic devices allowed
- Report 15 minutes before exam time

Good luck with your preparations!

news.title: Programming Lab Session Rescheduled
news.body:
Due to faculty availability, the Programming lab session scheduled for October 12 has been moved to October 13 at the same time (2:00 PM).

Please make note of this change and attend accordingly. All lab materials will be available on the resource hub.

news.title: Urgent: Physics Assignment Deadline Extended
news.body:
Good news! The Applied Physics Lab Report 1 deadline has been extended by 3 days. New deadline is October 23, 2025 at 11:59 PM.

Make sure to submit your reports on time through the submission portal.
